summary: This appears to be an internal email forwarding a Miami Herald article about the Jeffrey Epstein sex trafficking case, asking if the recipient is 'open on this' and if they 'can be'. It suggests internal discussion or monitoring of the case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded Miami Herald article about a sex trafficking case and accusations.

keyFacts: An email dated November 30, 2018, forwards a link to a Miami Herald article about Jeffrey Epstein and sex trafficking accusations.
The email's content 'Are we open on this? Can we be?' suggests an internal inquiry about engagement with or monitoring of the Epstein case.
The document is a piece of correspondence, indicating internal communication regarding the Epstein case as reported in the media.
